meanings.definition: Make someone feel strong, healthy, and full of energy.
meanings.sent1: The warm soup invigorated the sick child, making him feel better.
meanings.sent2: The sight of the ocean always invigorated her spirit and lifted her mood.
meanings.sent3: The invigorated group of friends decided to go on a spontaneous hike.
meanings.sent4: The laughter of children playing outside invigorated the neighborhood with joy.
meanings.sent5: The inspiring story invigorated her determination to pursue her dreams.
